== Usage ==

The video src attribute gives the address of the video.

== Values ==

The video src attribute must be a [http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-apps/current-work/multipage/infrastructure.html#valid-url valid URL].

== Elements ==

You can use the `src` attribute on the following elements:

  * [AudioElement <audio>]
  * [VideoElement <video>]
